parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Prevent the automatic execution of mobile code in {{ sc-18.4_prm_1 }} and enforce {{ sc-18.4_prm_2 }} prior to executing the code.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Actions enforced before executing mobile code include prompting users prior to opening email attachments or clicking on web links. Preventing the automatic execution of mobile code includes disabling auto-execute features on system components that employ portable storage devices, such as compact discs, digital versatile discs, and universal serial bus devices.
